rules_text:
When this artifact enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a permanent you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
Retrofit {2}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
